GenAiPromptTemplate.description: This prompt template formats the list of PTO requests into something that can be displayed to the employee
GenAiPromptTemplate.masterLabel: HRPTO Format List Of PTO Requests

templateVersions.content:
Display {!$Input:listRequestsPTO} but format with the following instructions.
For each PTO Request: - Display these fields: date, start, end, durationHours, isFullDay - If durationHours >= 8, then do not display the duration or times, if durationHours < 8, then display start, end, and duration - Convert all the start and end times from the ISO format ("2025-02-14T19:00:00.000Z") to the timeZone listed in each PTO request
Follow this example to format the data: ``` - 2025-01-13 Full Day - 2025-01-14 Full Day - 2025-01-15Â Full Day - 2025-01-15 10:00 AM ~ 3:00 PM (5 hours) ```
